replace.name: Naughty
replace.text: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library.
replace.source: Holiday gift to Wizards internal teams and business partners.

replace.name: Nice
replace.text: Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.
{T}: Add {3}. Spend this mana only on spells and abilities that create tokens. Use toys to represent the tokens.

Search target opponent's library for four cards with different names and reveal them. That player chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into the player's graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then that player shuffles their library.

replace.flavor: 'Tis better to give than to receive.
Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the bloodsoaked battlefields behind him.
